contest-event.event-date:
May 27, 1899 D Scunthorpe Contest
Scunthorpe Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
scunthorpe-contest
None
Show Ground, Scunthorpe Promoted by Scunthorpe Christian Temperance Band 1st prize £12 and 2nd prize £8 divided between King Cross and Sheffield Dannemora, 3rd prize £4. March contest 1st (£1) Scunthorpe Rifles, 2nd Grimsby Borough. 8 bands entered, 4 bands competed.
Nov. 2, 2011, 7:53 p.m. July 28, 2019, 8:52 a.m.
1 Dannemora Steelworks Robert Richford
1 Halifax King Cross Squire Firth
3 Scunthorpe Rifles Fenton Renshaw
4 Grimsby Borough Band Unknown
